title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.5 - Visitor or tourist information and services centers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.5 - Visitor or tourist information and services centers

State Regulations

In connection with development, operation and maintenance
agreements executed pursuant to section
42.2
of this Part or otherwise, the department is authorized to enter into agreements, contracts, or leases to
provide for the development, operation and/or maintenance of a visitor or
tourist information and services center to be leased for operation to the local
convention and visitor bureau in connection with the operation of facilities
pursuant to this Part. If such convention and visitor bureau does not exist or
declines to enter into such an agreement, contract, or lease, the department
may otherwise arrange for the provision of such a center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
